name: BaseInput
description: Base component for text inputs with validation support

props.name: validate
props.description: Validator type or custom validator function

props.name: markRequired
props.description: Whether to mark required field with an asterisk

props.name: errorMessage
props.description: The message to be displayed when the validation fails

props.name: validateOnStart
props.description: Whether to run the validation on mount

props.name: validateOnChange
props.description: Whether to run the validation on text changed

props.name: validateOnBlur
props.description: Whether to run the validation on blur
